DOC.brief_summary: The purpose non-interventional study collect data efficacy toxicity use Navelbine ORAL daily routine Germany ( especially availability 80mg capsule ) . The study focus concomitant antiemetic therapy patient compliance .
DOC.brief_title: Non-Interventional Study With Vinorelbine ORAL Advanced Non-Small Cell Lung Carcinoma ( NSCLC ) Metastatic Breast Cancer ( MBC )
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old Male female patient Advanced NSCLC ( Stage III IV ) Antracyclineresistant MBC Therapy Navelbine capsule palliative treatment line Signed patient inform consent Pregnancy nurse All exclusion criterion list SPC ( summary product characteristic ) lack sign Patient inform consent
